name: PONG Classic (SpaRK.boi)
description:
2 Player Mode CONTROLS:

Player 1 : 'W' and 'S'

Player 2 : 'Up' and 'Down'

NOTE: Please play in full screen for best experience. And Esc for quit from game.

Thanks for playing.
